section.title: Canceling Ongoing Virtual Machine Migrations
section.para: A virtual machine migration is taking longer than you expected. You'd like to be sure where all virtual machines are running before you make any changes to your environment.

step.para: Select the migrating virtual machine. It is displayed in the Virtual Machines resource tab with a status of Migrating from.

section.para: The virtual machine status returns from Migrating from to Up.
